reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Manea Beach Villas for 5 nights in a 1 bedroom lagoon view bungalow. The bungalow was basic but had nearly everything we needed. To be fully self catering we would have needed a stove top/oven, although the bungalow did have a fridge/freezer, microwave, toaster, electric jug and frying pan, and there was a bbq onsite for all guests to use.
reviews.title: Great option for tourists on a budget

reviews.text: The location of Manea Beach Villas is great... lots of restaurants and cafes around within easy walking distance, so people don't need to cook if they don't want to! The beach on that side of the island is lovely with the white sand and blue sheltered lagoon. There is also a pool, although it was colder than the ocean.
reviews.title: great spot to relax

reviews.text: The bed was comfortable and mozzie screens were a god-send as there were a few of the insects around. The shower pressure and water temperature was fantastic, but I think a little upgrade in the bathroom would be good as there were some water/rust stains that made it look less clean than it was.
reviews.title: Can't be beaten

reviews.text: This was my third time to Rarotonga and during my first two visits I stayed just up the road and paid twice as much. If you are looking for a nice place to stay that's not too expensive Manea Beach might just be it!
reviews.title: One of the best locations on Muri Beach

reviews.text: Manea is only a couple of minutes walk from the main Muri Beach area and is near to all the shops, restaurants etc of the area. Its right next to the very good Flame Tree Restaurant. Having the kayaks, swimming pools and beach veiws was great, the accomodation is very comfortable with the three bed houses having plenty of space and a great kitchen. Seemed to be good value for money compared to other options in this area. Muri is a great spot with plenty to do exploring the islands, snorkling, relaxing and walking.
reviews.title: Fantastic!!
